fields.name: PV Array
fields.value:
{"name": "PV Array", "description": "", "kpis": [{"name": "Efficiency", "identifier": null, "description": "

The ratio of the electrical power output compared to the solar power input into the PV cell.

", "computation": "avg((Pout / Pin) * 100)", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "Fill Factor", "identifier": "FF", "description": "

Measure of the quality of the solar cell, calculated at each data point.

", "computation": "avg(Pout / (Voc * Isc))", "hidden": false, "units": "Unitless"}, {"name": "Pin", "identifier": "", "description": "

The energy from the sun.

", "computation": "Area * Irr", "hidden": true, "units": "W"}, {"name": "Pout", "identifier": "", "description": "

The output power of the PV array.

", "computation": "Idc * Vdc", "hidden": true, "units": "W"}], "parameters": [{"name": "Voc", "identifier": "Voc", "description": "The open circuit voltage.", "units": "V", "hidden": false, "default": "520"}, {"name": "Isc", "identifier": "Isc", "description": "The short circuit current.", "units": "A", "hidden": false, "default": "970"}, {"name": "Area", "identifier": "Area", "description": "The area of the PV array.", "units": "m^2", "hidden": false, "default": "1450"}], "signals": [{"name": "DC Current", "identifier": "Idc", "description": "", "units": "A"}, {"name": "DC Voltage", "identifier": "Vdc", "description": "", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Irridiation", "identifier": "Irr", "description": "The power per unit received from the Sun in the form of electromagnetic radiation.", "units": "W/m^2"}]}

fields.name: PV Inverter
fields.value:
{"name": "PV Inverter", "description": "", "kpis": [{"name": "THD Voltage (Phase A)", "identifier": "THD_Va", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of the voltage (phase a).

", "computation": "avg(thd(window(Va, THDWindow), BaseHarmonic))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Voltage (Phase B)", "identifier": "THD_Vb", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of the voltage (phase b).

", "computation": "avg(thd(window(Vb, THDWindow), BaseHarmonic))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Voltage (Phase C)", "identifier": "THD_Vc", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of the voltage (phase c).

", "computation": "avg(thd(window(Vc, THDWindow), BaseHarmonic))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Current (Phase A)", "identifier": "THD_Ia", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of the current (phase a).

", "computation": "avg(thd(window(Ia, THDWindow), BaseHarmonic))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Current (Phase B)", "identifier": "THD_Ib", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of the current (phase b).

", "computation": "avg(thd(window(Ib, THDWindow), BaseHarmonic))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Current (Phase C)", "identifier": "THD_Ic", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of the current (phase c).

", "computation": "avg(thd(window(Ic, THDWindow), BaseHarmonic))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "Load", "identifier": "", "description": "

The ratio of the current load to the maximum load.

", "computation": "S / MaxS", "hidden": false, "units": "Ratio"}, {"name": "THD Voltage (Phase A) at Load Percentages", "identifier": "", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of voltage (phase a) once at 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%.

", "computation": "values("THD at 25% Load", avg(THD_Va if Load > 0.2 and Load < 0.3 else Nothing), "THD at 50% Load", avg(THD_Va if Load > 0.45 and Load < 0.55 else Nothing), "THD at 75% Load", avg(THD_Va if Load > 0.7 and Load < 0.8 else Nothing), "THD at 100% Load", avg(THD_Va if Load > 0.9 else Nothing))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Voltage (Phase B) at Load Percentages", "identifier": "", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of voltage (phase b) once at 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%.

", "computation": "values("THD at 25% Load", avg(THD_Vb if Load > 0.2 and Load < 0.3 else Nothing), "THD at 50% Load", avg(THD_Vb if Load > 0.45 and Load < 0.55 else Nothing), "THD at 75% Load", avg(THD_Vb if Load > 0.7 and Load < 0.8 else Nothing), "THD at 100% Load", avg(THD_Vb if Load > 0.9 else Nothing))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Voltage (Phase C) at Load Percentages", "identifier": "", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of voltage (phase c) once at 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%.

", "computation": "values("THD at 25% Load", avg(THD_Vc if Load > 0.2 and Load < 0.3 else Nothing), "THD at 50% Load", avg(THD_Vc if Load > 0.45 and Load < 0.55 else Nothing), "THD at 75% Load", avg(THD_Vc if Load > 0.7 and Load < 0.8 else Nothing), "THD at 100% Load", avg(THD_Vc if Load > 0.9 else Nothing))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Current (Phase A) at Load Percentages", "identifier": "", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of current (phase a) once at 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%.

", "computation": "values("THD at 25% Load", avg(THD_Ia if Load > 0.2 and Load < 0.3 else Nothing), "THD at 50% Load", avg(THD_Ia if Load > 0.45 and Load < 0.55 else Nothing), "THD at 75% Load", avg(THD_Ia if Load > 0.7 and Load < 0.8 else Nothing), "THD at 100% Load", avg(THD_Ia if Load > 0.9 else Nothing))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Current (Phase B) at Load Percentages", "identifier": "", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of current (phase b) once at 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%.

", "computation": "values("THD at 25% Load", avg(THD_Ib if Load > 0.2 and Load < 0.3 else Nothing), "THD at 50% Load", avg(THD_Ib if Load > 0.45 and Load < 0.55 else Nothing), "THD at 75% Load", avg(THD_Ib if Load > 0.7 and Load < 0.8 else Nothing), "THD at 100% Load", avg(THD_Ib if Load > 0.9 else Nothing))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Current (Phase C) at Load Percentages", "identifier": "", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of current (phase c) once at 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%.

", "computation": "values("THD at 25% Load", avg(THD_Ic if Load > 0.2 and Load < 0.3 else Nothing), "THD at 50% Load", avg(THD_Ic if Load > 0.45 and Load < 0.55 else Nothing), "THD at 75% Load", avg(THD_Ic if Load > 0.7 and Load < 0.8 else Nothing), "THD at 100% Load", avg(THD_Ic if Load > 0.9 else Nothing))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "Weighted Efficiency", "identifier": "", "description": "

The inverter efficiency measured at various load levels and combined via assigning weights each component.

", "computation": "(0.04 * avg(Efficiency if Load > 0.05 and Load < 0.1 else Nothing)) + \ (0.05 * avg(Efficiency if Load > 0.15 and Load < 0.2 else Nothing)) + \ (0.12 * avg(Efficiency if Load > 0.25 and Load < 0.35 else Nothing)) + \ (0.21 * avg(Efficiency if Load > 0.45 and Load < 0.55 else Nothing)) + \ (0.53 * avg(Efficiency if Load > 0.7 and Load < 0.8 else Nothing)) + \ (0.05 * avg(Efficiency if Load > 0.9 else Nothing))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "Pin", "identifier": "", "description": "

The total input energy (from DC).

", "computation": "Idc * Vdc", "hidden": true, "units": "W"}, {"name": "Pout", "identifier": "", "description": "

The total output energy.

", "computation": "Va * Ia + Vb * Ib + Vc * Ic", "hidden": true, "units": "W"}, {"name": "Efficiency", "identifier": "", "description": "

Ratio of the usable AC output power to the sum of the DC input power.

", "computation": "avg((Pout / Pin) * 100)", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}], "parameters": [{"name": "Base Harmonic", "identifier": "BaseHarmonic", "description": "The expected base harmonic of the AC voltage and current signals.", "units": "Hz", "hidden": false, "default": "60"}, {"name": "Maximum Irradiation (Standard Test Condition)", "identifier": "MaxS", "description": "The maximum rating of irradiation for the input PV array (indicates when max load is reached).", "units": "W/m^2", "hidden": false, "default": "1000"}, {"name": "THD Window Size", "identifier": "THDWindow", "description": "The moving segment of time (window) to run each THD computation on.", "units": "Time Window", "hidden": false, "default": ""1s""}], "signals": [{"name": "Voltage Phase A", "identifier": "Va", "description": "", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Voltage Phase B", "identifier": "Vb", "description": "", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Voltage Phase C", "identifier": "Vc", "description": "", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Current Phase A", "identifier": "Ia", "description": "", "units": "A"}, {"name": "Current Phase B", "identifier": "Ib", "description": "", "units": "A"}, {"name": "Current Phase C", "identifier": "Ic", "description": "", "units": "A"}, {"name": "Irradiation", "identifier": "S", "description": "The power per unit received from the Sun in the form of electromagnetic radiation from the input PV array.", "units": "W/m^2"}, {"name": "DC Current", "identifier": "Idc", "description": "", "units": "A"}, {"name": "DC Voltage", "identifier": "Vdc", "description": "", "units": "V"}]}

fields.name: Wind Turbine
fields.value:
{"name": "Wind Turbine", "description": "", "kpis": [{"name": "THD Voltage (Phase A)", "identifier": "THD_Va", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of the voltage (phase a).

", "computation": "avg(thd(window(Va, THDWindow), BaseHarmonic))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Voltage (Phase B)", "identifier": "THD_Vb", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of the voltage (phase b).

", "computation": "avg(thd(window(Vb, THDWindow), BaseHarmonic))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Voltage (Phase C)", "identifier": "THD_Vc", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of the voltage (phase c).

", "computation": "avg(thd(window(Vc, THDWindow), BaseHarmonic))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Current (Phase A)", "identifier": "THD_Ia", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of the current (phase a).

", "computation": "avg(thd(window(Ia, THDWindow), BaseHarmonic))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Current (Phase B)", "identifier": "THD_Ib", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of the current (phase b).

", "computation": "avg(thd(window(Ib, THDWindow), BaseHarmonic))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Current (Phase C)", "identifier": "THD_Ic", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of the current (phase c).

", "computation": "avg(thd(window(Ic, THDWindow), BaseHarmonic))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "Load", "identifier": "", "description": "

The ratio of the current load to the maximum load.

", "computation": "PWind / MaxPWind", "hidden": false, "units": "Ratio"}, {"name": "THD Voltage (Phase A) at Load Percentages", "identifier": "", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of voltage (phase a) once at 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%.

", "computation": "values("THD at 25% Load", avg(THD_Va if Load > 0.2 and Load < 0.3 else Nothing), "THD at 50% Load", avg(THD_Va if Load > 0.45 and Load < 0.55 else Nothing), "THD at 75% Load", avg(THD_Va if Load > 0.7 and Load < 0.8 else Nothing), "THD at 100% Load", avg(THD_Va if Load > 0.9 else Nothing))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Voltage (Phase B) at Load Percentages", "identifier": "", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of voltage (phase b) once at 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%.

", "computation": "values("THD at 25% Load", avg(THD_Vb if Load > 0.2 and Load < 0.3 else Nothing), "THD at 50% Load", avg(THD_Vb if Load > 0.45 and Load < 0.55 else Nothing), "THD at 75% Load", avg(THD_Vb if Load > 0.7 and Load < 0.8 else Nothing), "THD at 100% Load", avg(THD_Vb if Load > 0.9 else Nothing))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Voltage (Phase C) at Load Percentages", "identifier": "", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of voltage (phase c) once at 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%.

", "computation": "values("THD at 25% Load", avg(THD_Vc if Load > 0.2 and Load < 0.3 else Nothing), "THD at 50% Load", avg(THD_Vc if Load > 0.45 and Load < 0.55 else Nothing), "THD at 75% Load", avg(THD_Vc if Load > 0.7 and Load < 0.8 else Nothing), "THD at 100% Load", avg(THD_Vc if Load > 0.9 else Nothing))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Current (Phase A) at Load Percentages", "identifier": "", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of current (phase a) once at 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%.

", "computation": "values("THD at 25% Load", avg(THD_Ia if Load > 0.2 and Load < 0.3 else Nothing), "THD at 50% Load", avg(THD_Ia if Load > 0.45 and Load < 0.55 else Nothing), "THD at 75% Load", avg(THD_Ia if Load > 0.7 and Load < 0.8 else Nothing), "THD at 100% Load", avg(THD_Ia if Load > 0.9 else Nothing))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Current (Phase B) at Load Percentages", "identifier": "", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of current (phase b) once at 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%.

", "computation": "values("THD at 25% Load", avg(THD_Ib if Load > 0.2 and Load < 0.3 else Nothing), "THD at 50% Load", avg(THD_Ib if Load > 0.45 and Load < 0.55 else Nothing), "THD at 75% Load", avg(THD_Ib if Load > 0.7 and Load < 0.8 else Nothing), "THD at 100% Load", avg(THD_Ib if Load > 0.9 else Nothing))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "THD Current (Phase C) at Load Percentages", "identifier": "", "description": "

Total harmonic distortion of current (phase c) once at 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%.

", "computation": "values("THD at 25% Load", avg(THD_Ic if Load > 0.2 and Load < 0.3 else Nothing), "THD at 50% Load", avg(THD_Ic if Load > 0.45 and Load < 0.55 else Nothing), "THD at 75% Load", avg(THD_Ic if Load > 0.7 and Load < 0.8 else Nothing), "THD at 100% Load", avg(THD_Ic if Load > 0.9 else Nothing))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "Weighted Efficiency", "identifier": "", "description": "

The inverter efficiency measured at various load levels and combined via assigning weights each component.

", "computation": "(0.04 * avg(Efficiency if Load > 0.05 and Load < 0.1 else Nothing)) + \ (0.05 * avg(Efficiency if Load > 0.15 and Load < 0.2 else Nothing)) + \ (0.12 * avg(Efficiency if Load > 0.25 and Load < 0.35 else Nothing)) + \ (0.21 * avg(Efficiency if Load > 0.45 and Load < 0.55 else Nothing)) + \ (0.53 * avg(Efficiency if Load > 0.7 and Load < 0.8 else Nothing)) + \ (0.05 * avg(Efficiency if Load > 0.9 else Nothing))", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}, {"name": "Pout", "identifier": "", "description": "

The amount of energy that is extracted from the wind.

", "computation": "Va * Ia + Vb * Ib + Vc * Ic", "hidden": true, "units": "W"}, {"name": "Wind Power", "identifier": "PWind", "description": "

The total energy available to the wind turbine.

", "computation": "(1/2) * Density * Area * Velocity * Velocity * Velocity * Cp", "hidden": false, "units": "W"}, {"name": "Wind Turbine Efficiency", "identifier": "Efficiency", "description": "

The amount of energy that is extracted as fraction of the total energy available.

", "computation": "avg((Pout / PWind) * 100)", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}], "parameters": [{"name": "Base Harmonic", "identifier": "BaseHarmonic", "description": "The expected base harmonic of the AC voltage and current signals.", "units": "Hz", "hidden": false, "default": "60"}, {"name": "Maximum Wind Power", "identifier": "MaxPWind", "description": "The maximum amount of available wind energy (indicates when max load is reached).", "units": "W", "hidden": false, "default": "50000"}, {"name": "Area", "identifier": "", "description": "The area of the wind turbine's rotors.", "units": "m^2", "hidden": false, "default": "95.8"}, {"name": "Air Density", "identifier": "Density", "description": "", "units": "kg/m^3", "hidden": false, "default": "1.25"}, {"name": "THD Window Size", "identifier": "THDWindow", "description": "The moving segment of time (window) to run each THD computation on.", "units": "Time Window", "hidden": false, "default": ""1s""}, {"name": "Coefficient of Performance", "identifier": "Cp", "description": "The ratio of the power captured by the rotor of the wind turbine divided by the total power available in the wind just before it interacted with the rotor of the turbine.", "units": "Unitless", "hidden": false, "default": "0.59"}], "signals": [{"name": "Voltage Phase A", "identifier": "Va", "description": "", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Voltage Phase B", "identifier": "Vb", "description": "", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Voltage Phase C", "identifier": "Vc", "description": "", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Current Phase A", "identifier": "Ia", "description": "", "units": "A"}, {"name": "Current Phase B", "identifier": "Ib", "description": "", "units": "A"}, {"name": "Current Phase C", "identifier": "Ic", "description": "", "units": "A"}, {"name": "Wind Speed", "identifier": "Velocity", "description": "", "units": "m/s"}]}

fields.name: Diesel Generator
fields.value:
{"name": "Diesel Generator", "description": "", "kpis": [{"name": "Fuel Consumption", "identifier": "", "description": "

Amount of fuel that is consumed by the diesel generator.

", "computation": "avg(FuelConsumption)", "hidden": false, "units": "gal/hr"}, {"name": "Pout", "identifier": "", "description": "

The amount of energy generated by the diesel generator.

", "computation": "Va * Ia + Vb * Ib + Vc * Ic", "hidden": true, "units": "W"}, {"name": "Pin", "identifier": "", "description": "

The amount of energy provided to the diesel generator.

", "computation": "(DEC * FuelConsumption) * 1000", "hidden": true, "units": "W"}, {"name": "Generator Efficiency", "identifier": "Efficiency", "description": "

Ratio of the electrical output power to the fuel input power.

", "computation": "avg((Pout / Pin) * 100)", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}], "parameters": [{"name": "Diesel Energy Content Per Gallon", "identifier": "DEC", "description": "The amount of energy produced by diesel energy per gallon.", "units": "kW", "hidden": true, "default": "0.293*139"}], "signals": [{"name": "Fuel Consumption", "identifier": "FuelConsumption", "description": "Amount of fuel that is consumed by the diesel generator.", "units": "gal/hr"}, {"name": "Voltage Phase A", "identifier": "Va", "description": "", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Voltage Phase B", "identifier": "Vb", "description": "", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Voltage Phase C", "identifier": "Vc", "description": "", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Current Phase A", "identifier": "Ia", "description": "", "units": "A"}, {"name": "Current Phase B", "identifier": "Ib", "description": "", "units": "A"}, {"name": "Current Phase C", "identifier": "Ic", "description": "", "units": "A"}]}

fields.name: Transformer
fields.value:
{"name": "Transformer", "description": "", "kpis": [{"name": "PPrim", "identifier": "", "description": "

The input power.

", "computation": "VaPrim * IaPrim + VbPrim * IbPrim + VcPrim * IcPrim", "hidden": true, "units": null}, {"name": "PSec", "identifier": "", "description": "

The output power.

", "computation": "VaSec * IaSec + VbSec * IbSec + VcSec * IcSec", "hidden": true, "units": null}, {"name": "Efficiency", "identifier": "", "description": "

Ratio between the input power and the output power.

", "computation": "avg((PSec / PPrim) * 100)", "hidden": false, "units": null}], "parameters": [], "signals": [{"name": "Primary Voltage Phase A", "identifier": "VaPrim", "description": "", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Primary Voltage Phase B", "identifier": "VbPrim", "description": "", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Primary Voltage Phase C", "identifier": "VcPrim", "description": "", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Primary Current Phase A", "identifier": "IaPrim", "description": "", "units": "A"}, {"name": "Primary Current Phase B", "identifier": "IbPrim", "description": "", "units": "A"}, {"name": "Primary Current Phase C", "identifier": "IcPrim", "description": "", "units": "A"}, {"name": "Secondary Voltage Phase A", "identifier": "VaSec", "description": "", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Secondary Voltage Phase B", "identifier": "VbSec", "description": "", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Secondary Voltage Phase C", "identifier": "VcSec", "description": "", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Secondary Current Phase A", "identifier": "IaSec", "description": "", "units": "A"}, {"name": "Secondary Current Phase B", "identifier": "IbSec", "description": "", "units": "A"}, {"name": "Secondary Current Phase C", "identifier": "IcSec", "description": "", "units": "A"}]}

fields.name: Battery
fields.value:
{"name": "Battery", "description": "", "kpis": [{"name": "Round Trip Efficiency", "identifier": "", "description": "

Ratio of the total energy during discharging and charging Crating at 0.5 C once a month starts at SOC of 100% at its maximum voltage and discharge to 20% identified by the cut-out voltage. Then the battery is charged back at 0.5c to 100%.

", "computation": "abs(DischargeCapacity / ChargeCapacity * 100)", "hidden": false, "units": "Percent (%)"}, {"name": "Coulomb Efficiency", "identifier": "", "description": "

The ratio of the Ah that can be extracted from the battery during discharging, compared to Ah that enter the battery during charging. 

", "computation": "abs(cumsum(DischargeCurrent) * (DischargeTimestep/3600000)) / abs(cumsum(ChargeCurrent) * (ChargeTimestep/3600000)) * 100", "hidden": false, "units": "Percent (%)"}, {"name": "State of Health", "identifier": "", "description": "

The battery's state of health.

", "computation": "DischargeCapacity / (CRated * 1000) * 100", "hidden": false, "units": "Percent (%)"}, {"name": "State of Charge", "identifier": "", "description": "

The amount of charge the battery has.

", "computation": "avg(StateOfCharge)", "hidden": false, "units": "Percent (%)"}, {"name": "Discharge Capacity", "identifier": "DischargeCapacity", "description": "

The amount of charge that was identified during the discharging of the battery.

", "computation": "cumsum(DischargeVoltage) * (DischargeTimestep/3600000) * cumsum(DischargeCurrent)", "hidden": false, "units": "Wh"}, {"name": "Charge Capacity", "identifier": "ChargeCapacity", "description": "

The amount of charge that was identified during the charging of the battery.

", "computation": "cumsum(ChargeVoltage) * (ChargeTimestep/3600000) * cumsum(ChargeCurrent)", "hidden": false, "units": "Wh"}], "parameters": [{"name": "DischargeTimestep", "identifier": "", "description": "The time that passes between samples in the input battery discharging dataset.", "units": "ms", "hidden": false, "default": "250"}, {"name": "ChargeTimestep", "identifier": "", "description": "The time that passes between samples in the input battery charging dataset.", "units": "ms", "hidden": false, "default": "250"}, {"name": "CRated", "identifier": "", "description": "The rated capacity of the battery.", "units": "kWh", "hidden": false, "default": "400000"}], "signals": [{"name": "Charge Voltage", "identifier": "ChargeVoltage", "description": "A voltage signal taken during charging of the battery.", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Charge Current", "identifier": "ChargeCurrent", "description": "A current signal taken during charging of the battery.", "units": "A"}, {"name": "Discharge Voltage", "identifier": "DischargeVoltage", "description": "A voltage signal taken during discharging of the battery.", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Discharge Current", "identifier": "DischargeCurrent", "description": "A current signal taken during discharging of the battery.", "units": "A"}, {"name": "State of Charge", "identifier": "StateOfCharge", "description": "The amount of charge the battery has.", "units": "Ratio (from 0 to 1)"}]}

fields.name: Fuel Cell
fields.value:
{"name": "Fuel Cell", "description": "", "kpis": [{"name": "Pout", "identifier": "", "description": "

The energy produced by the fuel cell.

", "computation": "Idc * Vdc", "hidden": true, "units": "W"}, {"name": "Pin", "identifier": "", "description": "

The power content of the fuel cell.

", "computation": "HHV * MassFlowRate * 1000", "hidden": true, "units": "W"}, {"name": "Efficiency", "identifier": "", "description": "

The ratio of the electrical energy produced by the fuel cell to the power content.

", "computation": "avg((Pout / Pin) * 100)", "hidden": false, "units": "%"}], "parameters": [{"name": "Hydrogen Higher Heating Value", "identifier": "HHV", "description": "The amount of energy that can be produced by hydrogen.", "units": "kWh/kg", "hidden": true, "default": "39.39"}], "signals": [{"name": "DC Current", "identifier": "Idc", "description": "", "units": "A"}, {"name": "DC Voltage", "identifier": "Vdc", "description": "", "units": "V"}, {"name": "Mass Flow Rate", "identifier": "MassFlowRate", "description": "The mass of a hydrogen provided to the fuel cell per hour.", "units": "Kg/hr"}]}

fields.name: Water Quality
fields.value: {"name": "Water Quality", "description": "", "kpis": [{"name": "pH", "identifier": "_pH", "description": "", "computation": "avg(pH)", "hidden": false, "units": null}, {"name": "Total Dissolved Solids", "identifier": "_TDS", "description": "", "computation": "avg(Conductivity * TDSFactor)", "hidden": false, "units": null}, {"name": "Free Chlorine", "identifier": "_FreeChlorine", "description": "", "computation": "avg(FreeChlorine)", "hidden": false, "units": null}, {"name": "Turbidity", "identifier": "_Turbidity", "description": "", "computation": "avg(Turbidity)", "hidden": false, "units": null}, {"name": "Total Organic Carbon", "identifier": "_TOC", "description": "", "computation": "avg(TOC)", "hidden": false, "units": null}, {"name": "Dissolved Organic Carbon", "identifier": "_DOC", "description": "", "computation": "avg(DOC)", "hidden": false, "units": null}, {"name": "Ultra-violet 254", "identifier": "_UV254", "description": "", "computation": "avg(UV254)", "hidden": false, "units": null}, {"name": "Conductivity", "identifier": "_Conductivity", "description": "", "computation": "avg(Conductivity)", "hidden": false, "units": null}, {"name": "Temperature", "identifier": "_Temperature", "description": "", "computation": "avg(Temperature)", "hidden": false, "units": null}, {"name": "Differential Pressure", "identifier": "_DifferentialPressure", "description": "", "computation": "avg(DifferentialPressure)", "hidden": false, "units": null}], "parameters": [{"name": "TDS Factor", "identifier": "TDSFactor", "description": "", "hidden": false, "default": "0.67"}], "signals": []}

fields.name: Water Quantity
fields.value: {"name": "Water Quantity", "description": "", "kpis": [{"name": "Pump Efficiency (Hydraulic power/Electrical power)", "identifier": "", "description": "", "computation": "HP / EP * 100", "hidden": false, "units": "Percent (%)"}, {"name": "Measured Hydraulic Power", "identifier": "HP", "description": "", "computation": "9810 * AvgQ * AvgDP", "hidden": false, "units": "W"}, {"name": "Electrical Power", "identifier": "EP", "description": "", "computation": "avg(Va * Ia + Vb * Ib + Vc * Ic)", "hidden": false, "units": "W"}, {"name": "CQ", "identifier": "", "description": "", "computation": "AvgQ/((RS/60) * 0.14*0.14*0.14)", "hidden": true, "units": ""}, {"name": "CH", "identifier": "", "description": "", "computation": "(9.81 * AvgDP) / ((RS/60)*(RS/60)*0.14*0.14)", "hidden": true, "units": ""}, {"name": "CP", "identifier": "", "description": "", "computation": "EP / (1000 * (RS/60) * (RS/60) * (RS/60) * 0.14 * 0.14 * 0.14 * 0.14 * 0.14)", "hidden": true, "units": ""}, {"name": "Pump Efficiency (CQ*CH/CP)", "identifier": "", "description": "", "computation": "CQ * CH / CP * 100", "hidden": false, "units": "Percent (%)"}, {"name": "AvgDP", "identifier": "", "description": "", "computation": "(avg(DP) * 0.70283)", "hidden": true, "units": ""}, {"name": "AvgQ", "identifier": "", "description": "", "computation": "(avg(Q) * (0.003785 / 60))", "hidden": true, "units": ""}], "parameters": [{"name": "Rotational Speed", "identifier": "RS", "description": "", "units": "", "hidden": false, "default": "1750"}], "signals": [{"name": "Differential Pressure", "identifier": "DP", "description": "", "units": "m"}, {"name": "Flow", "identifier": "Q", "description": "", "units": "gpm"}]}
